summary:
Christine
My own character
Save game and Preset
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#FA0401]FR girl[/color][/size]


[img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5567/14134735698_3a1aca8173_b.jpg[/img]

I have many requests and now I uploaded Save game and Preset for Racemenu|CharGen to nexus.
She is Breton girl. One of my the best works.

[size=3][color=#FA0401][url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim//mods/47063/]FR Girl Followers Christine & Gloria[/url][/color][/size]

[size=5][color=#FF0001]Required:[/color][/size]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/]Mature skin texture and body for UNP[/url] by Maevan2
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/url] by humannature66
SG Hair Pack (268 hairs edition) by HelloSanta [google it]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu and Overlays[/url] by Expired
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/]CharGen Extension[/url] by Expired

[size=5][color=#FF0001]Recommend:[/color][/size]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by Diethardt
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28740/]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos Overlays[/url] by THEHAG and BladeSinger06 - [Chest Vamp tattoo]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin for Tattoos[/url] by Desufire - [Leg and Privat area - Woodelf tattoo]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/]Smile in HD[/url] by zzjay
Dirt mods or clean head mods.
Game DLC

[size=1] Optional effects [Manual installing]:[/size]
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24318/]Barbarian Body Normalmap[/url] by HoneyVanity
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14569/]univision Face Specularmap[/url] by DD AKT
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29006//]Fgems Female Head Normalmap[/url] by Fgem



Not the same face?
Go Showracemenu and manual edit it:

Correctly types:

Vannilla types
Nose type 3
eyes type 9
brow type 1
lips type 11

Chargen Plugin [Necessary mod]

NoseWide -1.3
NoseBridge 0.3
LipThick 0.2
EyeSize 0.4
EyesOpen 0.1
JawShape -0.3
CheekShape 0.2
MouthWidth -0.1
MouthSmile 0.3
NoseTilt 0.1
LipsOpen 0.2
NoseAreaDepth 0.2
ChinSlope -0.5
FareHeadDepth 0.1
LipThick2 0.3
Thickness -0.69
NoseSellionHeight 0.1
NoseSellionWight 0.1
NoseRidgeShape 0.1
Chargen_EarHeight 0.1
Chargen_ElfEar 0.1
Other Chargen - 0 or standart

If you have ugly face:
Copy "femalehead_msn" from your DataTexturesactorscharacterfemale
Try to create new folder DataTexturesactorscharacterbretonfemale
Put there femalehead_msn [your Fgems Female Head Normalmap]




[size=3]If you want to replace your character to this.[/size]
Download CharGen preset file.
Install it.
Open game.
Load your save.
Go showracemenu and select preset, load it by F9.


Sorry for my english, FR


Credits
To all mods authors. You are the best!
[/center]
author: furiousreason
